test1.title: Why we need to play
test1.instructions: For questions 1-8, read the text below and decide which answer (A, B, C or D) best fits each gap.

So why do human beings spend so much time playing? One reason is that we have time for leisure; animals have very little time to play as most of their life is spent sleeping and {3} food.

evidenceSpans.highlight: Human beings are not the only creatures that like to have fun

questions.explanation: The correct phrase is 'have fun' - to enjoy oneself or experience pleasure.

evidenceSpans.highlight: we carry our sense of fun right into adulthood

questions.explanation: 'Carry' means to continue something from one stage to another. We 'carry' our sense of fun into adulthood.

evidenceSpans.highlight: most of their life is spent sleeping and seeking food

questions.explanation: 'Seeking' means actively looking for something. Animals spend time 'seeking food' for survival.

evidenceSpans.highlight: opportunity for us to engage in enjoyable activities

questions.explanation: 'Engage in' means to participate actively in an activity.

evidenceSpans.highlight: does it have a more important purpose

questions.explanation: 'Purpose' refers to the intended goal or function of something.

evidenceSpans.highlight: Apart from being fun, play has several very real benefits
play has several very real benefits for us

questions.explanation: 'Benefits' refers to positive effects or advantages.

evidenceSpans.highlight: helps us prepare for what we have not yet experienced

questions.explanation: 'Prepare for' means to make ready for future events.
